name: Dynamite Soccer 2004 Final
overview: Dynamite is the latest installment of football series is the basic concept "freedom of play", "sense of manual operation" is powered up further. The direction to kick the ball, also the speed of the ball, the player is up to all operations. Sometimes the mistake of course, great excitement when the goal is not to be forgotten! Since the type of game you want to improve enough to practice, enjoy the heat of battle Sako. This late entry into the PlayStation's soccer lineup focuses on the series' typical values such as the feeling of manual control and player freedom, while adding new dribbling mechanics, tuned balance and Japanese player/stadium data for 2004.
